paymentSuccess.description: Your payment has been successfully processed and your plan is upgraded to @:appName {}. You can view your plan details on the Plan page

downgradeDialog.title: Are you sure you want to downgrade your plan?
downgradeDialog.description: Downgrading your plan will revert you back to the Free plan. Members may lose access to this workspace and you may need to free up space to meet the storage limits of the Free plan.

cancelSurveyDialog.title: Sorry to see you go
cancelSurveyDialog.description: We're sorry to see you go. We'd love to hear your feedback to help us improve @:appName. Please take a moment to answer a few questions.

questionOne.question: What prompted you to cancel your AppFlowy Pro subscription?
questionOne.answerFour: Did not use it enough to justify the expense

questionTwo.question: How likely are you to consider re-subscribing to AppFlowy Pro in the future?

questionThree.question: Which Pro feature did you value the most during your subscription?

questionFour.question: How would you describe your overall experience with AppFlowy?
